description:
Fourteen-year-old Machi Amayadori is sick and tired of life in her "boring" mountain village, but can a girl raised by a bear make it in the big city?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kuma to Shoujo: Owakare no Toki
Ours et fillette, le temps des au revoir
Time for Bear and Girl to Part
クマと少女 お別れの時
